title: Emmission of aNyan Pool and Creating Marketing Fund
body:
Considering the current tokenmetrics structure and the number of tokens in circulation, I have a suggestion to strengthen the liquidity pool.

To encourage token holders and new investors to support the trade pool’s liquidity pool, I think it would make sense to lower the reward rate of the aNyan stake pool. As you know, since the ownership of the stake contracts has been renounced, I have no chance to interfere with the contracts. So the only chance I’ll be able to do this will be to put the unlocked tokens I have in the anyan stake pool. Thus, the emission of aNyan stake pool will be reduced by about half.

In this way, I want to direct new investors who want to benefit from high APR to add liquidity to the pool by buying tokens.

If we do this, I believe that both the liquidity pool will grow and the price will be positively affected.

I want to withdraw the staking rewards of the tokens I will lock on a weekly basis and allocate half to the developer wallet and half to the marketing fund. Thus, we will both have a developer fund that can continue development and create a budget for marketing.

I present this issue for your consideration.
author: 0x27854A16aB3154FB8D8c52fDbA67063EC86f5072
